DOC.brief_title: Multi-Arm Feasibility Study Evaluating OTX-TP Compared Timolol Treatment Subjects With Open Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Subject must great equal 18 year age Screening . Subject must document diagnosis ocular hypertension , open angle glaucoma . Subject mean baseline ( Day 7 Day 0 ) Hour 0 ( T0 ) untreated IOP ≥ 24 mm Hg ≤ 34 mm Hg eye , ( T0 + 4h ) ( T0 + 8h ) IOP ≥ 22 mm Hg Baseline Visit 2 . Untreated IOP must ≤ 34 mm Hg eye time point baseline visit . Subject BCVA 0.6 logMAR ( 20/80 Snellen ) good eye measure use ETDRS chart .
